blogPost.excerpt: Forward emails from your own domain to your personal email. Support wild card routing, catch-all forwarding, fan out to multiple addresses. Support webhook so you can process incoming emails and build application based on email workflow.
blogPost.body: Forward emails from your own domain to your personal email. Support wild card routing, catch-all forwarding, fan out to multiple addresses. Support webhook so you can process incoming emails and build application based on email workflow.
blogPost.title: Hanami - Easy email forwarding for your domain
blogPost.author: Vinh

localize.description: 将自己域名的邮件转发到个人邮箱。支持通配符路由、全局转发、扇形转发到多个地址。支持webhook，使您可以处理收到的邮件，并根据邮件工作流程建立应用程序。
localize.tagline: 为您的域名轻松转发电子邮件

localize.description: 將自己域名的郵件轉發到個人郵箱。支持通配符路由、全局轉發、扇形轉發到多個地址。支持webhook，使您可以處理收到的郵件，並根據郵件工作流程建立應用程序。
localize.tagline: 爲您的域名輕鬆轉發電子郵件

previous.title:
A Japanese billionaire is looking for eight volunteers to fly to the moon with him on Elon Musk’s spaceship: “I will pay for the entire journey," Yusaku Maezawa says.
https://t.co/eiaRSr9L3g

localize.full_text:
一位日本亿万富翁正在寻找8名志愿者，与他一起乘坐埃隆-马斯克的飞船飞向月球。"我将支付整个旅程的费用" 前泽雄策说。
https://t.co/eiaRSr9L3g

一位日本億萬富翁正在尋找8名志願者，與他一起乘坐埃隆-馬斯克的飛船飛向月球。"我將支付整個旅程的費用" 前澤雄策說。
https://t.co/eiaRSr9L3g
